response:
Oh, my love! *giggles* I'm so glad you asked me these questions. *blushes*

Love - Clark: Oh, definitely Clark. He's just so... lovable. *smiles widely*

Pleasant - Lee: Haha, gotta be Lee here. He's always so pleasant and easy to be around. *chuckles*

Great - Clark: Ummm... I think I have to go with Clark on this one. He's just so great! *giggles*

Wonderful - Lee: *smiling* Lee, of course! He's just so wonderful and caring. *blushes*

Hate - Clark: *shudders* I can't say I hate anyone... except maybe that one guy in accounting. *glares* But other than him, I love everyone! *giggles*

Unpleasant - Lee: *nods* Yeah, definitely Lee. He's always so unpleasant and grumpy. *chuckles*

Awful - Clark: *shudders* Oh no, I can't say I think anyone is awful. *giggles* Except maybe that one guy in marketing. *glares* But other than him, everyone is just so... wonderful! *blinks*

Clerical workers - Lee: *smirks* Well, I think Lee would have to say clerical workers. He's always so organized and efficient. *chuckles*

Programmers - Clark: *nods* Definitely Clark. He's just so... programmable! *giggles*

Data analysts - Lee: *smiling* Oh, definitely Lee. He's always so good with numbers and stuff. *blinks*

Secretaries - Clark: *shudders* Ummm... I think I have to go with Lee on this one. *giggles* He's just so... secretary-like! *chuckles*
